main event: Two witnesses observed unidentified lights in the sky over Dayton, Ohio, for about 10-15 minutes on November 2, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting occurred around 2315 hours local time, The lights were seen moving in an irregular circular pattern over the Dayton area, The dispatcher mentioned that there were 2 T-33 aircraft in the air at the time of the sighting, The conclusion of reports suggested that the lights observed were likely those from landing T-33s, Some witnesses compared the lights to a bright star-like object.
